name: Speed Traffic- Endless City
description:
Speed Traffic- Endless City!!!
The controls of this game are very easy. There is a choice of buttons, steering wheel or gyro sensor to steer your car in this street driver car game. The accelerator and brake will help you control the speed of your car in this grand rally race game. There is a nitro to boost your accelerate and you will gain highest speed in this street driver car game.
Features:
-Drive with highway traffic
- Amazing 3d graphics
- Accurate physics controls
- Realistic racer cars
- Realistic car driving experience
